main event: Two round objects were observed in Kokomo, Indiana on July 7, 1957.
interesting points: The objects changed colors, exhibiting six or seven different hues., The sighting lasted for 37 minutes., The objects appeared to stop, hover, and then accelerate at high speeds., The report suggests that the sighting was probably caused by a balloon., This incident was categorized under military observations.
sighted object: two round objects with changing colors
